Movie.Title: Total Recall
Movie.Writer: Philip K. Dick (short story "We Can Remember It For You Wholesale"), Ronald Shusett (screen story), Dan O'Bannon (screen story), Jon Povill (screen story), Ronald Shusett (screenplay), Dan O'Bannon (screenplay), Gary Goldman (screenplay)
Movie.Actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Rachel Ticotin, Sharon Stone, Ronny Cox
Movie.Plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or is he?
Movie.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 14 nominations.
